name: Typical Bounceball Game
description:
This game is a 3D remake of 2D game, Bouncy Ball by Raon Games.

It's my first project for game jam, it was hard but really fun.

Any feedback would be appreciated!

Move character

Change dimension

Flip camera

Restart the level

(Also this is my first attempt on 3D game, so expect a ton of bugs lmao)

[Used assets]

Lean Pool

Unity 2D-extra
